description.paragraph_1: Pensión Maite** is located in the Amara neighbourhood of Donostia-San Sebastián next to the Anoeta-Illumbe sporting complex, very close to the hospital area and a short walk from the Euskotren station (San Sebastián - France), and bus station.
description.paragraph_2: It is located on the Avenue of Madrid, next to the city entrance/exit and a few minutes walk from La Concha beach
description.paragraph_3: It is located in a commercial area that has all the necessary services (shops, bars, restaurants, long term parking areas, etc).
description.paragraph_4: Well communicated with the rest of the city thanks to the continuous city buses that stop at the door of the guesthouse.

benefits.section_header: What does it have to offer?
benefits.text_1: Pension Maite offers free Wifi for guests throughout the facility.
benefits.text_2: Although check-in and check-out times are defined, they can always be adjusted to your needs after prior notice to the establishment.
benefits.text_3: It is possible to make a reservation directly from the website or by contacting Pensión Maite.
benefits.text_4: It has an exceptional location, well communicated with the whole city and in a neighbourhood with all the necessary services.

reviews.section_header: What our customers say about us

roomTypes.topText: The pension Maite offers 16 rooms adapted to the latest architecture standards
roomTypes.bottomText: Possibility of a family room consisting of two rooms, one double and one triple, separated from the rest of the guesthouse by a door.

roomDescriptions.single_description: Habitación sencilla pero muy acogedora, perfecta para trabajadores y viajeros que lo que buscan es un lugar agradable donde dormir, tener una buena conexión wifi y tener baño privado. Además, dispone de escritorio y frigorífico.

roomDescriptions.triple_description: Habitación ideal para tres personas que buscan un lugar agradable donde dormir, tener buena conexión wifi y baño privado.
